net.netnook.repeg

Interface OnSuccessHandler

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface OnSuccessHandler
    An OnSuccessHandler is the primary way to handle and process matched input in order to create a parse result. An OnSuccessHandler for an expression will only be called when the expression matches. When called, a Context object will be passed which can be used to retrieve the matched input as well as modify a stack in order to build a parse result. See Context for more information.

    Important: A Context object may be re-used across calls to multiple OnSuccessHandlers. You should therefore not keep a reference for use later but instead do all processing immediately in the accept(Context) method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static OnSuccessHandler CLEAR_STACK
      Clear current stack content added by current expression of descendents.
      static OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT
      Get a CharSequence of the current input and push it onto the stack.
      static OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_FLOAT
      Convert current input to an Float using new Float(String) and push it onto the stack.
      static OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_INTEGER
      Convert current input to an Integer using new Integer(String) and push it onto the stack.
      static OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_NULLABLE_FLOAT
      Convert current input to an Float using new Float(String) and push it onto the stack.
      static OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_NULLABLE_STRING
      Convert current input to a String and push it onto the stack.
      static OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_STRING
      Convert current input to a String and push it onto the stack.

    • Field Detail

      • CLEAR_STACK

        static final OnSuccessHandler CLEAR_STACK
        Clear current stack content added by current expression of descendents. See Context.clear().

      • PUSH_TEXT

        static final OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT
        Get a CharSequence of the current input and push it onto the stack.

      • PUSH_TEXT_AS_STRING

        static final OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_STRING
        Convert current input to a String and push it onto the stack.

      • PUSH_TEXT_AS_NULLABLE_STRING

        static final OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_NULLABLE_STRING
        Convert current input to a String and push it onto the stack. Pushes null if current input has 0 length.

      • PUSH_TEXT_AS_INTEGER

        static final OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_INTEGER
        Convert current input to an Integer using new Integer(String) and push it onto the stack.

      • PUSH_TEXT_AS_FLOAT

        static final OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_FLOAT
        Convert current input to an Float using new Float(String) and push it onto the stack.

      • PUSH_TEXT_AS_NULLABLE_FLOAT

        static final OnSuccessHandler PUSH_TEXT_AS_NULLABLE_FLOAT
        Convert current input to an Float using new Float(String) and push it onto the stack. Pushes null if current input has 0 length.
